line_1: They downa bide the stink o' powther;
line_2: Their gun's a burden on their shouther;

line_1: They downa bide the stink o' powther;
line_2: Their bauldest thought's a hank'ring swither,

line_1: They downa bide the stink o' powther;
line_2: Till skelp — a shot — they're aff, a' throw'ther,
